statement_text: The outbreak has impacted millions of animals with outbreaks in commercial poultry and in back yard flocks, cows, wild birds, wild mammals and some cases among pets, mostly among cats.

rationale: The segment uses neutral language ('has impacted') without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
